lead_paragraph: Olympic champion Elena Dementieva maintained her hot streak to reach the U.S. Open semi-finals with a 6-2 6-3 win over Switzerland’s Patty Schnyder on Tuesday.
snippet: Olympic champion Elena Dementieva maintained her hot streak to reach the U.S. Open semi-finals with a 6-2 6-3 win over Switzerland’s Patty Schnyder on Tuesday.
